website_summaries.verdict: The Sony DR-BT22 Bluetooth headset offers an effective way to cut the cord from your cell phone or MP3 player, while still enjoying stereo audio.
pros: The Sony DR-BT22 offers useful features such as a multifunction call button and a track shuttle rocker
The headset is easy to use and offers good range
cons: The Sony DR-BT22 is pricey and its construction feels rickety

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great everything—except staying on your head!!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly miss these. I used to use them at work. When i was flying a desk, they were awesome: good for VOIP calls, a long enough range to go all the way to the bathroom, paired fast with my computer or iPhone, and the sound was Sony. But there was no way I could wear them on the street. They just kept falling off. And running was impossible with them. Now I have a job where I have to use closed-air headphones, and these sit on a shelf. :\
customer_reviews.author: ShaunM

customer_reviews.title: I Use these headphones every day
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted to replace and uncomfortable behind the ear wireless set I had. I find these much more comfortable and they do have a good sound but the folding headband is crappy and cheap. It causes the speakers to ride forward on my ears as I walk forceing me to constantly readjust them. Just fair warning to if they rattle around in a backpack or pocket they will totally disassemble themselves i.e. the speakers will pop out of the frame and just dangle there by their wires. They arn't perfect yet, but this is a decent working Bluetooth pair that does have a stable sound, and pairs easily to an iPhone 4.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Ok sound, ok quality, needs a carrying case, needs better sound...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a lot of headphones over the years. This set is ok, if it didn't cost $50. For $25 I would have rated it higher. The sound quality is just ok, the range is fair, the battery life is fine. The two biggest problems is the sound is not really that impressive and the overall quality is a bit flimsy. It folds up, then folds in half. Sounds good, but without a carrying case, it doesn't "lock up" into place, it just flops around. I don't mind it, but for $50 I'd expect better. I'm thinking of replacing them with a nicer set, haven't decided yet. I wouldn't order them again, given the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Deals

customer_reviews.title: It took a beating with style...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in 2011 The plastic just broke on them today. The speakers still work, though. For the amount of money I spent on them, I really got a lot of good use out of them. They had good quality sound and it made me extra stoked when walking everyday to not have that cord jostling all over creation or getting caught up in your arms while you're exercising. These were really good quality and lasted a lot longer than any other set of headphones I've had --wired or wireless.
customer_reviews.author: W. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for a few days and it works well with my ASUS netbook and Motorola Rival 455 phone. There seems to be a glitch with the Motorola phone in that it says it is connected when I turn the headset on. It usually doesn't work until I go into the phones bluetooth menu and drop and reconnect the headset. I don't have this problem with my netbook. My guess is that the glitch is in the phone and not the headset. Sound quality is what you would expect from phones of this size (not much bass). The microphone seems to work well also.
customer_reviews.author: Randy L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Works with Iphone
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are terrific, and, notwithstanding prior comments here, work with the Iphone. I have a 2G, and an Infinxxx dongle. I paired the 2G phone with the headphones and then the dongle. Sound is great -- crystal clear (as others have said) & controllable between the volume on the headphones and the sound profiles on the Iphone. Honestly, couldn't be happier! One thing -- you have to paid the phone first, then the dongle. Reverse doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: R. Herz

customer_reviews.title: Sony Bluetooth headsets
customer_reviews.text: Best set of BT headsets that I have ever purchased. The sound quality is great, battery life is excellent and syncing is simple. This also gives you great control over your iPod or cell phone. I sync this device with both at the same time and it pauses the music from my iPod Touch, allows me to take the call and then resumes the music when I hang up the call. Great device, just forget about looking cool with this on your head if you are bald, not so bad with a baseball cap :-).
customer_reviews.author: Maarlon Des Vignes

customer_reviews.title: Works great...
customer_reviews.text: We each have one of these headsets. I'm not much of a phone person so I wear these & do my chores when I have to be on the phone. They also enable me to understand my father on the phone (speech problems). We like them so well, we got this set for my father to help him when on the phone. The only problem we have is that they pick up close room noises too well (using the ice maker is painful for the person on the other end of the line). We use these constantly!
customer_reviews.author: sidney

customer_reviews.title: Poor audio quality and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Look closely at the pictures and you'll see these heaphones have three parallel ridges under in the center of the head piece arch that dig into your skull. As soon as I unpacked these headphones I placed them on my head and immediately knew this was a horrible design flaw. When I finally got them paired with my phone and laptop I was even more disappointed since the audio quality is horible with both devices. I'm so unhappy with this purchase I threw them in my glovebox and use them only for short phone calls while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Jascas

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: This headphone set works great with my iPod Touch 2nd gen. without the need of any seperate transmiter. I searched all the Bluetooth units on Amazon and weighed all the pros and cons from all the reviews. This unit seemed to fit my needs best and I was right. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: PapaJ

customer_reviews.title: Olden style is golden for me.  Love  the take down features.  The newer version is bulkier and generates more heat around my ear
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this older style as I can still hear everything else going on. The fact they will play for 11 hours on a single charge is terrific . Replaceable batteries give them an extra life. I'm most pleased. Glad they are still available.
customer_reviews.author: Eight Dollar Bob

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and poor sound
customer_reviews.text: They fall off my ears and always push against one part of my ear, which makes them unusable. The microphone on them is worse than on my laptop or phone, and people cannot understand me. The sound is okay, typical of medium-quality Bluetooth components. The only good thing about these is the range. I can walk around the kitchen and they still sound the same. I would not recommend taking these outside, as one jolt or twist of the head and these will fall right off.
customer_reviews.author: guyze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful headphones, and the bluetooth range is fabulous. Good rich sound, and Great Bass.
customer_reviews.author: Rob  Taulbee

customer_reviews.title: Headset Teview
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in perfect condition and working appropriately. I have been enjoying my headset since I received them. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: msharley

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my TMobile Dash. Able to make phone calls and listen to music. Folds down to a smaller size. This was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Burchett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I know these are old now, but I love them. Used almost everyday for hours over the last year. Still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: MSwamp

customer_reviews.title: no more wires
customer_reviews.text: I love not having to deal with tangled wires anymore. I think the sound is good and the controls are easy to use. The only drawbacks are that the headphones are a little tight for my big head, and it's another thing I have to remember to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: wheelmaker

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Sonically Sound
customer_reviews.text: These Stereo Headphones sound great & are really really comfortable to wear. Nice to not have any wires tethering you to a device.
customer_reviews.author: Amppcguru

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Not the best fit but good. The sound is great and the mic is OK according to the people I talked to.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: good RF, decent sound, questionable build
customer_reviews.text: bought a pair from tiger the first feeling is the headband is kinda flimsy, perhaps it's foldable RF is pretty good, it goes a bit further with HP211 than other wireless headphones sound is OK, but I wish there's a mini leather earpad, that can greatly increase bass, now I use the one from Koss portapro, and the sound is better than original it's rather comfortable, no problem with big ears note: press slide button down can connect to last a2dp device a side note: if you want better audio, the headset can be modified very easily another note: I don't use it as HSP/HFP device, no comment given
customer_reviews.author: matt.mingkee

customer_reviews.title: Love Love I've owned these headsets for over 10 Yrs ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Love I've owned these headsets for over 10 Yrs purchased them from Circuit City at the same price listed on Amazon wow it's remarkable Sony is still charging the same price only thing I wish is that these headsets could be compatible with other devices. Well it works great with my Ipad 3 battery life is awesome hours of playtime major plus WHO needs Beats or any other when Sony has mastered perfection...
customer_reviews.author: T. P

customer_reviews.title: great headphone very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with DRBT22 bluetooth headphone, very comfortable compare to the Jabra BT620s bluetooth headphone (behind the neck style) paird with nokia 6126 phone and sony bluetooth xmitter which connected to home audio system at same time, working seamlessly nice sound quality, very clear, no noise, cut ot drop any kind at all, don't seem have the problem as others described ! when headphone pairs with phone while listen to music, music will stop and you will hear phone ring, after call the music will resume, isn't it great ! phone voice dialing working no problem ! Over all great bluetooth headphone by SONY !
customer_reviews.author: K. Chen

customer_reviews.title: OK, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The styling and functionality of these is great. Despite folding up quiet small they also seem to remain very strong and consturcted well unlike other folding headsets. Main issue I have with them is their primary function, as a BT wireless headset. No matter what device I have them connected to, my cell phone, laptop or my Cowon s9 they drop audio. I have tested other co workers BT headphones on the same devices with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: T.Toscano

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and fragile
customer_reviews.text: Well i purchased these with a Sony bluetooth adapter for my ipod touch,they worked great for about 2 months then the power button started sticking and would turn on and off whenever it wanted,was working again for about 2 weeks and the problem started again,it was real annoying,then i accidentally dropped them and the earpiece broke off,these are not worth 10 dollars they are built like garbage.they lasted a total of 6 months,i had to purchase another brand of headset.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Agresti

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected: PROS: Pairs easily, lightweight, volume and call buttons work, and the battery life is good. CONS: Slightly bulky for the pocket. They fit on your head but after a while they plastic flexes and I wouldn't trust the headphones to stay on if running at full speed. OVERALL: For the price and enjoyment I have gotten out of these, I give a 5/5 star rating. I would recommend these headphones as a "starter" pair for anyone wanting to try to used bluetooth headphones. If you like these, then you may want to try a more expensive brand when you upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pechter

customer_reviews.title: Does Work with Iphone / Ipod Touch w/ 3.0
customer_reviews.text: I agree with most of the other reviews. The headphone works great, but the folding mechanism feels flimsy. I've used it for about a year and nothing's broken yet, but I'm careful to keep them in a case in my backpack. Just take an extra second to fold and unfold them gently and you'll have no problems. They do work fine with my 2nd gen Ipod Touch with 3.0 system software.
customer_reviews.author: John Hale

customer_reviews.title: If you have music blue tooth cell phone you need this headset
customer_reviews.text: I have tried adapters with 2.5 plugs but why bother with that. Really impress with headphone set. Reason Im writing this review is because I got confused when my cell phone kept asking for a pass code to use the headset. No information came with headset for passcode so I check on the internet. The passcode for this headset was 0000. Hope this is helpful for anybody buying this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Meisel

customer_reviews.title: Best Set of BT Headphones I've Tried so Far
customer_reviews.text: This is the best set of bluetooth headphones I've tried so far. In the past I've used the nokia bh501, sony bt21g, a jabra pair (that i forgot the model), and these. If you want to get away from the wires and don't mind slightly fragile construction these are a really good set of phones. I took one star off because I feel like these headphones are about $20 more than they should be. That being said if my current pair broke tomorrow I'd buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Struggling Med Student

customer_reviews.title: Nice technology!!!
customer_reviews.text: They work great!!! They can play music up to 11 hours, and it charges very fast, from empty to fully charge in about 1.5 hr. I also have a Sony bluetooth transmitter, and they work perfectly well together.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G. MacKay

customer_reviews.title: A little annoying hiss...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first stereo bluetooth headphone, so I can't really compare with any other. But, given the good reviews from this Sony model, I was hoping for a little more sound quality. There is a constant annoying hiss and the sound is loud, but not really clear, mainly with weak bass. The price was reasonable, the battery life is great, but I'm kind of sceptical with bluetooth stereo headphones sound quality since then...
customer_reviews.author: Marcus V

customer_reviews.title: sony bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: this is a great buy. i can pair it with my phone and my friend's phones. i also managed to pair it with my thinkpad laptop and hear all sounds and music. its great with all these functionalities. the sound quality is great, and the battery life is beyond my expectations. this is a great buy at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Potencia

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: I was unsatisfied with this model because the sound wasn't that clear and I couldn't pair it with my laptop. But I gave to my friend and he could pair it with his laptop but still the sound is below the expectations. The other thing is that the mic is built in and not sensitive enough to get your voice if you sit beside the TV or other people. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nayef

customer_reviews.title: sound great at a great price.!
customer_reviews.text: can't beat sony quality bluetooth headphones at this price.! clarity is exceptional. i can hear each instrument very distinctly. ear cushion could be a little more thick. otherwise great wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: TMY4561

customer_reviews.title: sweet
customer_reviews.text: This product is great with no problem, its just a little softer than the one I had just like this b4
customer_reviews.author: Iain

customer_reviews.title: Amazon's tips were fantastic and they stick with their point
customer_reviews.text: Honest. It was released on date. Amazon's tips were fantastic and they stick with their point.
customer_reviews.author: corvin J. young

customer_reviews.title: Did not pair with my Treo 680
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device after reading the review in this web site. However after trying to pair with Treo 680, I am going to return it to get my full refund. The manual is not clear and support is very minimal. I will not recommend this device to anyone to use it wit Palm Treo products.
customer_reviews.author: Samji

customer_reviews.title: FOR WHAT I WANT...
customer_reviews.text: IT'S ALL RIGHT. I JUST DON'T RATE IT 5 'CAUSE IT WOULD BE PERFECT. AND PERFECT IS TOO MUCH... NO, SERIOUSLY, YOU CAN BUY IT FOR SURE!
customer_reviews.author: Marco Antonio Scarpato de Oliveira

product_meta.title: Sony DRBT22 Wireless Stereo Headset (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe DR-EX230DP includes a handsfree stereo headset for communicating online with its in-line microphone and an included carrying case for easy portability. The great-sounding earbud headphones feature 9mm driver units and three silicone earbud sizes for the perfect fit. Your next trip suddenly sounds a whole lot better.
feature_bullets: Listen to music wirelessly with Bluetooth-equipped devices
Receive phone calls using the hands-free function
Operate basic functions of Bluetooth audio devices by remote

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars70 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
